item.title: Need help need to know how to add commands! i added the code but it wont work
item.dc:creator: @liamscape liamscape
item.description:
@liamscape wrote:

Well here is the most command command

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme"))
	{
		teleportToX = 3237;
		teleportToY = 3433;
		inwildy = false;
	sendMessage("Your such a chicken LOL!");
	}

It is pretty simple to understand
This is what u type to get the command to work

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme"))

this is what the coords are

		teleportToX = 3237;
		teleportToY = 3433;

this is if its in wildy

inwildy = false;

change false to true if it like teles u to mage bank or greaterz

sendMessage("Your such a chicken LOL!");

that is the message sent once u do u can make them double up like this to

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme"))
	{
		teleportToX = 3237;
		teleportToY = 3433;
		inwildy = false;
	sendMessage("Your such a chicken LOL!");
	sendMessage("Why are u a chicken?!?!?!?!?!?!");
	}

That is the basics of a teleport command. SOz its a bit messy don’t have much time :eek:[br][size=1]Posted at: November 20, 2006, 05:08:29 PM[/size][hr]This is a basic item command

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starterkit"))
	{
				addItem(2665,1);
				addItem(2667,1);
				addItem(2663,1);
				addItem(2661,1);
				addItem(2657,1);
				addItem(2659,1);
				addItem(2655,1);
				addItem(2653,1);
				addItem(2673,1);
				addItem(2675,1);
				addItem(2671,1);
				addItem(2669,1);
	sendMessage("Welcome to LIAMSCAPE, enjoy the Freebees!");
	}

Just add more items by copying it and doing enter and use tab!!!
You should understand the message from the item one.
The command

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starterkit"))

Is what u type so u’d type ::starterkit

KK i hope u get the idea not to hard. Otherwise if u want some commands made just speak to me I might be able to get a couple done while im doing pc stuff.

Read full topic
